![](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/utmkl.jpg "utmkl")

Apart from the AHIBS MBA, we also offer MBA ODL, MSc, Phd and DBA programmes. The MSc programme geared towards industry or business professionals with cutting-edge curriculum.  The PhD programme is designed for those seeking academic research and teaching careers as faculty in the study of management and technology in higher learning education. The Doctoral Business Administration (DBA) programme aims to produce innovative scholar-manager who are able to think critically, develop vision for the future and possess leadership skills. 

Find out more about the programme:
